caption.center: FRANKLIN G. SLAGEL, Appellant, v. HARRY E. HUFF, Respondent.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment affirmed, with costs. All concur. (The judgment dismisses the plaintiff's complaint in an action for breach of contract.)
